title: urf
body: Honestly, this year's rendition of urf is probably the shittest urf I have played to date. Limiting the champion pool, basing the game on rng due to the champs you get. Jesus. Not fun. Riot give the public back what it wants. give back old urf.

replies.body:
if you don't like it, play a different game mode.
/rocket surgery
If we don't protest then we won't get back old URF
this guys just copy pasted that comment to everything he can find. he thinks he'll get some up-votes or something i think.
if you dont like it play another game mode ? what aram infested with player bots or rift full of feeders and flamers good game modes to play mad well done

> [{quoted}](name=ranga In Õrbit,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=WMZZJbn0,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-12-23T12:38:37.680+0000)
>
> if you dont like it play another game mode ? what aram infested with player bots or rift full of feeders and flamers good game modes to play mad well done

I don't understand what you're trying to say.

sorry. you said if you dont like the game mode(urf) go play another, the only others are aram full of player bots and rift full of feeders and flamers treeline is not worth it and no one even playes it anyway.

I had one game where it was my team, which was garbage, against Ezreal, Varus, Warwick, Shen, and Jax.

What a painful 10 minutes that stomp was.
You only gets bots in ARAM at off-peak times (early in the morning), or if you deserve bots.
